attr.title: Kikai
attr.inst: Get the game on https://farawaytimes.itch.io/kikai and place all game files in the ports/kikai/gamedata/ directory.
attr.inst_md: Get the game on the [Far Away Times itch.io page](https://farawaytimes.itch.io/kikai), and place all game files in the ports/kikai/gamedata/ directory.
